peregrine.controller
Class BaseJob<T>

java.lang.Object
  peregrine.controller.BaseJob<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageSerializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Batch, Job
public abstract class BaseJob<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageSerializable

A 'batch' of jobs sent to the controller at once.

Method Detail

getIdentifier

public long getIdentifier()
A unique ID for this batch. This ID is valid for the entire life of the controller and is globally unique.

public T setIdentifier(long identifier)
